ygData.subject: Re: Thermal Cloak
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I know no one knows the actual Thermal Cloak recipe except the one in the books. And, Tailor made cloaks don t work. Oh and where did you hear
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I know no one knows the actual Thermal Cloak recipe
except the one in the books. And, Tailor made cloaks don't work.
Oh and where did you hear Tinkerer's could make armor?



On 24 Dec 99, at 20:50, cerceta@... wrote:

> From: cerceta@...
>
> 1. Has anyone discovered the formula for the Thermal Cloak?
> 2. If so what are its components?
> 3. What is the ac and stats of the tinker's only set of makeable
> armor?
>
> I am haveing 20+ tattered cloak made to make myself some thermal under-
> wear and i hope that it is gonna pay off with the formula but... we
> shall see
>
>
> Grundup Necro and DE killer
>
> >
